metadata.name: Pixel Value Punks: "01 Cryp+CheckerPunk"
metadata.description: Pixel Value Punks: "01 Cryp+CheckerPunk" is a unique and vibrant Open Edition NFT that blends the classic pixel art style of early video games with the edgy, rebellious spirit of the punk movement. Featuring a striking black, green and red checkered pattern, this NFT showcases a Cryptopunk character in all its pixelated glory. With its sharp lines, bold colors, and dynamic composition, Pixel Value Punks: "01 Cryp+CheckerPunk" is sure to capture the attention of collectors and enthusiasts alike.
